attributes.action: Declare your interest in Islamisation of the UK, which is why you have not come out against the rioters in Turkey who resist Islamisation there.
attributes.additional_details: The Islamic uprising in Syria, against Assad is being supported by the Cameron government.  The people of Turkey who are rioting against the Islamisation of their country have NOT been supported by the Cameron government.  Perhaps there is a message there for the people of this country to get to grips with SOON?
